element.name: TLazProject.MainFileID
element.short: The index of the file with the main source, for example the lpr file

element.name: TLazProject.Files
element.short: All files of project plus files in source editor plus closed files once open in the source editor

element.name: TLazProject.MainFile
element.short: The main source file, can be nil, otherwise equivalent to Files[MainFileID]

element.name: TLazProject.Title
element.short: The project title, used for Application.Title statement

element.name: TLazProject.IsVirtual
element.short: True if project has not yet a full file name, i.e. it was not yet saved

element.name: TLazProject.CreateProjectFile
element.short: Create a new file, which is added to the project Files

element.name: TLazProject.AddFile
element.short: Add a file to the project

element.name: TProjectFlag.pfSaveClosedUnits
element.short: save metadata of closed files in the lpi

element.name: TProjectFlag.pfSaveOnlyProjectUnits
element.short: Do not save metdata of foreign files in the lpi (i.e. files with IsPartOfProject=false)

element.name: TProjectFlag.pfMainUnitIsPascalSource
element.short: Main unit is pascal, IDE can check it for common mistakes

element.name: TProjectFlag.pfMainUnitHasUsesSectionForAllUnits
element.short: IDE updates the uses section of the main file if units are added, removed or renamed

element.name: TProjectFlag.pfMainUnitHasCreateFormStatements
element.short: Automatically add/remove/update Application.CreateForm statements for forms and datamodules

element.name: TProjectFlag.pfUseDesignTimePackages
element.descr: Designtime packages are only needed for designing the project forms, because they contain component and property editors. Only runtime packages contain code. If you want to test a designtime package you can create a project with this flag. Then the IDE will add the unit paths to the designtime packages too.

element.name: TProjectFlag.pfLRSFilesInOutputDirectory
element.short: Set this flag to tell the IDE to store .lrs files in the unit output directory instead of the directory where the lfm is.

element.name: TProjectFlag.pfUseDefaultCompilerOptions
element.short: After creating the new project the IDE applies the users build modes and compiler options.
